class.name: LibSM64SurfaceProperties
class.brief_description: Class representing the properties of the surface in the [code]libsm64[/code] world.
class.description: [LibSM64SurfaceProperties] is a resource class that encapsulates the physical properties of a surface in the [code]libsm64[/code] world. It combines three key properties that define how Mario interacts with surfaces: the surface type (affecting Mario's behavior), terrain type (affecting sound effects), and force (for surfaces like quicksand that can move Mario). This class is primarily used with [LibSM64SurfaceArray] to define surfaces for use in the game world.

members.member: The force the surface will exert over Mario. Not all [enum LibSM64.SurfaceType] values are compatible with this property.
The type of the terrain of the surface.
